question: The term “Bali Declaration”, which was recently in news, is related to which of the following?
option1: To establish free trade area in South Asia
option2: To cut greenhouse gases by phasing out the use of fossil fuels
option4: To promote cross-cultural exchanges and civilisational linkages between Southeast Asia and India
explanation: \"Bali Declaration\" was adopted at the \"World Parliamentary Forum on Sustainable Development\", in Indonesia. Indian parliamentary delegation refused to be a part of the Bali declaration adopted recently. India objected the part of declaration highlighting deep concern on the ongoing violence in the Rakhine State of Myanmar. India reiterated its stance that purpose of convening Parliamentary forum was to arrive at a mutual consensus for implementation of SDGs which required inclusive and broad-based development process.
